DataElement.preferredName: Urinary Medication At Timepoint Use Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number of urinary medications used at a specific timepoint.

Concepts.definition: Urinary; of or relating to urine, of or relating to the urinary system, or of or relating to the function or production or secretion of urine.

A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.
